synopsis.text:
Unsure of what awaits him, Yan Yuechu returns to his beloved hometown to pursue a career, finding solace in his newfound friends and a fulfilling job. One fateful day, he stumbles upon the enigmatic Xu Aiyou, the proprietor of the local "X&Y Escape Rooms". As he delves deeper into the world of escape rooms, he finds himself inexplicably drawn to her. But as their bond strengthens, Yan Yuechu's life takes a dark turn, plagued by a series of bizarre occurrences.

As these eerie events begin to involve his friends, Yan Yuechu embarks on a quest to decipher the connection between the escape room puzzles and the strange happenings in his life. Who is the enigmatic mastermind orchestrating these events, and what secrets do they hold about Yan Yuechu's forgotten past? As the line between reality and illusion blurs, he must navigate the labyrinth of mysteries to unveil the truth and protect those he holds dear.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
